titles.title: Requesting that the President transmit to the House of Representatives all information in his possession relating to specific communications with Chrysler LLC ("Chrysler").

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 111-147.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 71.

bill.summary: 6/12/2009--Reported to House without amendment. Directs the President to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of all documents, records, and communications in the President's possession referring or relating to certain scheduled plant closings of Chrysler LLC.
